name: Blackwell Manor
description:
Break into the house of an evil necromancer to bring heroic justice, destroy his magic amulet, and claim all his useful magical items for yourself. Click on objects in the overworld to interact with them. Combat encounters are initiated by touching enemies or stepping on specific tiles.

Controls:

  • Arrow keys / Left Mouse Click to move
  • Enter / Spacebar /  Left Mouse Click to confirm or interact with something
  • Esc / Right Mouse Click to cancel or access the menu
  • Hold Shift to dash

Or rebind the keys to something that works better for you in the options menu.
